description:
The men's Marsh Long Sleeves Shirt is made from a premium jersey made from 100% organic cotton. You will definitely appreciate the softness and lightness of the fabric during all your daily activities.

Designed by Alana Louise, the prints on the front and back of the shirt are meant to highlight the importance of protecting our wetlands, one of the most productive ecosystems on earth. They are home to an impressive number of migratory birds, fish, amphibians, a wide variety of plants and many other species.

Wear it proudly on your next expedition.
name: Hooke Rockies LS Tee - Mens
